author: Chester Yung
title: Deripaska Quits Rusal Board as Metals Giant Looks for Sanctions Relief
text:
Russian aluminum giant United Co. Rusal PLC Friday said Oleg Deripaska has resigned as a non-executive director, expanding a sweeping overhaul of the company’s management and board in an effort to escape the Trump administration’s sanctions program.
Mr. Deripaska, who is widely seen as an ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin, resigned as president of Rusal earlier this year but had remained on the board as a non-executive director. He is now vacating that role with immediate effect as a result of the sanctions, Rusal said...
